Text:
DVDRip 720p x264 AC3

Unfortunately my DVD ripper don't copy languages, so there are many audio languages that are not described. I've just found it out, so I can't write it manually already. Most of them are English, Italian, Spanish and French. Additionally there are a lot of subtitles in external files (more than 10 languages).

Czesc MEZmaster.

Zeby przetwozyc DVD z kilkoma audio track, sprubuj http://www.avs4you.com programy albo http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix
Te drugie sa za darmo i dzialaja na Win i Linux.

Powodenia
